The grid shows the prices and daily availability from Sat 1 Aug 15 to Fri 7 Aug 15 (B&B - price includes breakfast, DB&B - price includes dinner & breakfast). It's easy to check availability for particular dates, just use the calendar to choose the check in date, select the number of nights and click the Search button.
